bio: During harsh training on a snowy mountain, Shogunyan has become one with the snow. He is so precise, he can cut a snowflake in two!

soultimate.name: Icy Bonito Blade
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: ↓ foe's Spd when attacking, 1% ↓ per hit, lasts 5 sec.
skill.name: Frozen Blade

name: Frost Shogunyan
